text: The Congolese Football Federation (; FECOFOOT) is the governing body of football in the Republic of Congo. It organizes the football league Congo Premier League and the national football team. The association was founded in 1962 and joined FIFA in the same year. It also became a member of CAF in 1966. Category:1962 establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Sport in the Republic of the Congo Category:Organizations based in the Republic of the Congo
title: Congolese Football Federation
